episode_desc: Here’s a little taste of what’s to come with [i]Salty Trivia with Candy Barre[/i]. Sample one of each question type, except the other type of Grand Finale.

outro_game.s: From the bottom of my heart,[#1920#]thank you for participating in this very first episode[#5598#]of Salty Trivia with Candy Barre.[#7395#]
